title: Looking for a New Laptop
body:
The laptop that I'm using currently has been acting especially wonky in the last month or two (it is over 5 years old so that's not surprising), and as such I've been looking for a replacement laptop and was wondering if anyone could give me any suggestions? I know little to nothing about computers so any help would be greatly appreciated. It absolutely does not have to be high end (preferably under 600$-700$), as I am a very casual gamer and am accustomed to playing League of Legends at very low settings and with poor fps. All I'm looking for is a budget laptop that I can play League of Legends on at reasonable fps (40/50/60) with medium/low settings. Thank you in advance for all of your help. 

EDIT: In the research that I've done, I've seen this laptop mentioned multiple times: https://www.amazon.com/Acer-Aspire-i5-8250U-GeForce-E5-576G-5762/dp/B075FLBJV7/ref=as_li_ss_tl?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=B075FLBJV7&pd_rd_r=M84CSXV69Y0FT5YX0HQW&pd_rd_w=iozq3&pd_rd_wg=lRkGk&psc=1&refRID=M84CSXV69Y0FT5YX0HQW&linkCode=sl1&tag=laptops4study-20&linkId=8112427cfaa86d1446fbab801ee5fcf9
I have also seen this laptop mentioned as a cheaper alternative: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B079TGL2BZ/ref=sspa_dk_detail_1?psc=1&pd_rd_i=B079TGL2BZ&pd_rd_w=DFYmA&pf_rd_p=80559f3c-f83b-49c1-8a72-40f936e9df7a&pd_rd_wg=7p1Xl&pf_rd_r=GTN89STMVWEFENF7KQHH&pd_rd_r=69f1e156-5fa6-11e9-97cc-7fd3667cd97a
